website_summaries.verdict: For dogs who like lamb, these freeze-dried portions work equally well as occasional treats, dry food toppers, or complete reconstituted meals.
pros: Can be used as freeze-dried treats
Contains lamb organ meats and bone meal
Can be added to dry kibble as a topper or served separately
cons: Prepackaged portions are small, challenging to reconstitute
Lamb flavor is not universally popular with dogs

customer_reviews.title: URGENT WARNING - MOLDY FOOD
customer_reviews.text: **PLEASE DO NOT BUY OR GIVE TO DOGS!!! 12/20/19: Opened package of the lamb and it is filled with mold. Bag was bought two days prior. Please check your bags. Seller needs to recall products, contact every single buyer, and investigate ASAP.** I’ve used Primal Pet Freeze Dried products for years and this is the first time I’ve seen this. Definitely no longer doing business with Primal Pet and its distributors. Scary stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: There might be something wrong with this batch of lamb dog food. Our dog Cory eats this brand and does really well. However when fed the lamb formula he started vomiting, dry heaving, and had diarrhea all night long. We switched Cory to another flavor of Primal Nuggets and he did fine. This could have been a chance occurrence, but Cory was accidently fed the food again and the same thing happened. Will not buy the lamb again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great food - crumbles easily - dog happier and healthier
customer_reviews.text: We switched our overweight chihuahua (mutt) to Primal freeze dried a few months ago.. He loves it, and is excited about every meal. The lamb crumbles really easily as does the chicken. The pork is slightly firmer and the beef a bit difficult to crumble. Our dog has lost a little over a pound (about 2 to go) since we started this food and it not having as much itchiness and redness on his nose/snout. He seems healthier and happier. The kids enjoy seeing how excited he gets for his food every single time. If he could write the review, he would probably say, "More!!!"
customer_reviews.author: A. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Primal Is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Primal Dog Food is a STAPLE in my household. We have 2 small extremely finicky dogs, and Primal is the only food they eat. It is excellent quality, and they love the taste. They also have treats, and my dogs are fans of those as well. Primal is an amazing company with high CLEAN products.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: My little pug really like this food
customer_reviews.text: My little pug really like this food!! I will mix in a little cooked chicken or beef, because 3 and a half nuggets, well, just really isn't enough. But he is doing really well on this. He gets fed twice a day. The raw organic frozen is always first choice, but this is great for convenience. I follow a naturopathic vet. Dr. Becker....she highly recommends the organic freeze dried second to the frozen!!! This is a very good brand!! The price is right as well!!! Stay away from the commercial dog food products you find in the grocery stores!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion E. Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transfer my dog to this new food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has food allergies and this food is excellent. She scarfs it down and it was easy to transition from royal canine PV prescription diet. I am a new fan of this brand. It has never been so easy to transfer to a new food. Also her friend, a picky pug named Oscar is liking it now as well. He tried it on vacation with us.
customer_reviews.author: amazongroupie

customer_reviews.title: Senior Dog Doing Great On Primal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My almost 12 year old chihuahua/maltese loves it. Trying to get her off kibble and on to something healthier for her, especially in her senior years. She has been suffering with allergies and I think it's a combination of grain and grass because she was constantly licking her feet to the point of being almost raw. Spent hundreds of dollars on vet bills and meds, and nothing really seemed to help. Once she started eating Primal grain-free I almost immediately (within a couple of days) noticed a big difference. So happy that she is doing so much better now. I will be keeping her on Primal.
customer_reviews.author: lovetakingpictures

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: The best part of this food is that my rescue pom enjoys it and it is so easy to prepare. I don't have to cook, or worry about what she is eating because I feel confident that what this food contains is healthy for her. In the past if I wanted to feed raw, I had to buy blocks of frozen dog food and thaw it. Because she is small, it would go bad before it was gone. I noticed with this food she had better breath and more energy. There are no days she does not clean up her plate. My next plan is to get different flavors so I can give her a variety.
customer_reviews.author: H20 Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great food but very expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Dogs crave it! But for 2 x 20 lb Westies we are spending on 2 packs a week about $64! So while I do believe this food helped my Fergus recover from near death Addisons episode it is VERY PRICY! I need to buy it in bulk! It is amazing food- just expensive as caviar!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to add raw...
customer_reviews.text: These crumbled easily onto my dog's Orijen, allowing me to add the benefits of a raw diet with the convenience of something in a bag that can travel well and sit in a pantry. Best of all, my German shepherds, even the picky one, LOVES this. They make great treats, too, and the size of each piece snaps in half easily. Yes, it's pricey, but the ingredients can't be beat, and, compared to similar products, this Amazon price is actually pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Sev's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: This makes traveling a breeze. It's light and easy to transport. If you don't have warm water, you can break it up and add lukewarm or cold water, and in a pinch you can feed it to your dog without water. My pup seems to love it any way I've prepared it. It's easy to mix other food in with it as well. This is a great alternative to raw food when someone is petsitting for you. Instead of asking them to put together meals for the dog, they can toss this in the bowl with water.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Riggio

customer_reviews.title: Duke loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I used to do my own raw grinds, but had to give up my meat slicer and food grinder. We now live in a RV and this food is a great alternative for feeding raw.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Simple ingreds, awesome food.
customer_reviews.text: Primal is number one in my house for my dogs. They love all the flavors, and I love the fact it doesnt build up plaque on their teeth like alot of kibble does. Its a huge hit with my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Super fresh!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this food for my dog, and I love this suplier, the dog food looks and smells very fresh, which is a very important quality when buying freeze dried raw foods.
customer_reviews.author: Milli🌺

customer_reviews.title: No synthetic vitamins and Approved by my Boy
customer_reviews.text: The only freeze-dried my dog likes. He won't eat K9 nor Vital, but will eat Chewy. However, the only one he likes is Primal. Primal is the only freeze-dried without synthetic vitamins besides Vital which often smells rancid.
customer_reviews.author: FurbyMama

customer_reviews.title: He gets bored with his food easily
customer_reviews.text: My dog would not eat if I add water, so he eats it dry for his breakfast. I give him Primal raw meat for dinner. He gets bored with his food easily, but he still eats this (I get different meat ones every time), so I am happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: h a

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Naturally my picky dog loves this food but it is too expensive to feed it to him exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: K. Preast

customer_reviews.title: Ate It Then Rejected It
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food for a month then just stopped eating it. I hate wasting expensive food like this. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyLady

customer_reviews.title: My dog is loving it.
customer_reviews.text: We started switching to freeze dried food. And our dog loves it. Poop is better and weight management is easier!
customer_reviews.author: Shielisse

customer_reviews.title: Organic complete healthy meal
customer_reviews.text: Used Primal dog food--frozen or freeze dried--for several years. My pets have incredible coats and love the food. I have a 3.5 lb and 7 lb pom right now and figure the food is money well spent. A person with a bigger dog might find it a tad expensive. I don't plan to switch brands any time soon, only switch around the protein once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: AnneN

customer_reviews.title: One happy pooch!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the item I thought is was a kibble, turns out to be same size nugget has the frozen product, tad more difficult to prepare, but the dog loves the product. Since I've switched to Primal, I've noticed a profound change with my dog, not as hyper, better coat, yard clean up is considerably less, try it the for 2 weeks and I think you'll notice a difference in your pet too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.  A waste of $30.00 plus.
customer_reviews.text: For my 1/12 year old dachshund. She just smelled it and walked away. Wouldn’t even try it. I even mixed it with her favorite.... a cooked egg and wouldn’t even touch the egg.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Until the Smell Changed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs likes these but I probably won't be buying them again. They started to smell a bit rancid after several days and I wound up throwing them away as I was hesitant to give them to my dog after the smell changed. Probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: daughterofthesun

customer_reviews.title: I usually mix it with dry kibble like a soup base for him
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and thinks he's getting a special treat. I usually mix it with dry kibble like a soup base for him. Clean bowl every time. Fur is on fleek.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beware  - Made both my dogs sick!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! my little dogs have been eating Stella & Chewy's freeze dried raw . However decided to try Primal . I added 1/2 brick to their S & C to get them started, both times they vomited it after a few hours! NO RETURNS So I'm stuck with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A.

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect healthy food for my dog and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine247365

customer_reviews.title: this food is easy to serve and is great if you are traveling
customer_reviews.text: My little dog, who has had some sort of trauma connected with the food bowl (he is a rescue) loves this food. He actually follows me waiting for it. He usually runs away when I set out his food! However, his interest has begun to wane so I am trying the chicken next. Also, this food is easy to serve and is great if you are traveling.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful food
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love it, the ingredient list is awesome- no fillers or synthetic supplements like in other brands of freeze dried dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it however I gave 4 stars because it’s just to expensive
customer_reviews.author: erika del rosso

customer_reviews.title: Treats
customer_reviews.text: Great treats for my Greyhounds. Too $$ to use as food though
customer_reviews.author: dawn vondeylen

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: We rotate chicken, lamb and beef a bag at a time. Our two toy poodles, 4.5 lbs and 7.5 lbs love it. They get some Orijen kibble on the side for crunch. Primal is very nutritious, a top priority for our girls and easy to prepare? Especially easy to take on a trip. We use the calculator on the Primal site to be sure the girls get the correct amount.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: This is just awesome food. I give my pet much less than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just awesome food. I give my pet much less than suggested and mix dry dig food and more water in it....he like it better with warm water. This particular flavor is harder to break up but he loves it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pack

customer_reviews.title: Full approval from the pup
customer_reviews.text: Good prodcut, i just crumble it on top of food for an added flavor, and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Raluca Anghel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Another one of the primal foods our girls enjoy. So much easier getting the freeze dried for traveling and it isn't changing their diet so no hassle of slowly introducing a new food .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Our fussy dogs love this food. If you are looking for good quality food then this is it. We have been using for a few years now & our dogs are healthy fit & well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Big A

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. I just wish it didn’t have clay in it. Otherwise good food.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Feeding Raw but Dehydrated
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'll feed my dog and he loves them. He's never scratched or had any allergies. Feeding raw is the best way to good!
customer_reviews.author: Llinda R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to prepare
customer_reviews.text: Easy to prepare, slight smell that I dont care for but worth it for how my dog looses it while waiting for his meals to be ready. He licks the bowl clean every time. Was highly recommended for it's good, quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: She'll eat it, but...
customer_reviews.text: My 13-lb dog is a picky eater. Both Primal and Stella & Chewy's are high quality foods, but my dog much prefers Stella and Chewy's lamb to that from Primal. Perhaps it's because S&C's lamb patties feel softer, more moist.
customer_reviews.author: KayMac

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves food - I love the food for the dog
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves food - I love the food for the dog. I was upset with the shipping over order. Shoved in an priority mail package. Food is broken which is hard to determine how much to feed dog. The other primal order I placed order was in a box food was exactly as designed. I will go back to original company.
customer_reviews.author: Curl Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs with allergies
customer_reviews.text: Best dog food ever. Can I nly recommend. I don't even make it wet...just crumble it...my dog loves this food
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. Made in the USA. Fully trust it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Primal Nuggets are great!
customer_reviews.text: I grind the nuggets up and sprinkle on top of my dogs food....He is such a picky eater, but the Primal Nuggets stimulate his appetite!
customer_reviews.author: Patriotic Texan

customer_reviews.title: My dogs pretty much adore this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs pretty much adore this food! I buy it when it's on sale, because I have 3 small dogs and it becomes pretty pricey. Anyway, giving it a 4 star because of the expense, but easy to use, good for their health, and one of their favorites.
customer_reviews.author: All for Him

customer_reviews.title: great for when I can't get frozen
customer_reviews.text: My dog has seizures but since switching back to Primal, they have reduced. I am trying some other products as well as a supplement I just ordered from Amazon Prime and will see if it cuts down even more. I am giving her organic coconut oil and some chinese herbs and Taurine.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Pet approved
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these! We break it up add hot water water and mix on top of her normal dog food, she can’t get enough.
customer_reviews.author: JA1234

customer_reviews.title: My dog's coat became nice and shiny
customer_reviews.text: My dog's coat became nice and shiny. Easy to prepare, just break it up and add 1 oz. of water per block.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is an EXCELLENT food! I use Orijen dry dog food (which is another EXCELLENT food), and crumble half a block of this on top to stimulate my senior dog to eat. It's loaded with only the best, raw ingredients, and dogs really do go nuts for it!
customer_reviews.author: snowboardchick

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dog food on the face of the earth
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food on the face of the earth. My dogs have been on this food since they were 10 weeks old....no health issues at all and they are thriving!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love Primal food. I do take an extra step to shred it in my food processor before adding warm water to it. But it’s a nice alternative to canned food.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Shapel

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky dogs loved your product! They are very picky and I waste a lot of money on purchasing food in which they will not eat. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Magic Powder
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is spoiled and will not finish his kibble unless I sprinkle some of this freeze-dried formula into it! My husband and I call it his "Magic Powder". What can I say? We are forced to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: xSvd90

customer_reviews.title: Good to travel with
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy this food. I have used the primal raw food, but it is difficult to travel with. This solves that problem and I feel good about what I feed my pups.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Our dog started eating this brand a year ago. He loves it so much he dances in circles when it’s dinner time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Primal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My dog has Inflammatory Bowel Disease and has a very hard time keeping her weight stable and also breaking down food. We have tried all sorts of foods. I use to to supplement her regular food and it helps keep her protein level up and her weight up too. I use the lamb formula only so that is the only one I can comment on but both my dogs love it. I can't afford to feed it as their only food - one dog is 68 and the other 36.
customer_reviews.author: P. RobbinsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our Lhasa loves the Primal Pet Formulas
customer_reviews.text: I buy all flavors of the Primal Dog Food because our Callie likes variety in her menu and why I offer a variety of Natural Balance Food Rolls, high grade kibbles, and all flavors of Primal Formula. They are all winners for our once picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Faye L. Bowring

customer_reviews.title: Great food...A little Pricy
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients! Definitely a more healthy way to feed your dog, but my dog is 50lbs so to feed her this 3 times a day in too much. But I do give it to her once a day and she really enjoys it. Plus it is easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: NRS

customer_reviews.title: He is maintaining a great coat, sparky attitude
customer_reviews.text: Jhustin loves it!!! Only problem is he wants more 8o). He is maintaining a great coat, sparky attitude, and almost more stamina than I can handle 8o).
customer_reviews.author: khrackerjakh

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie loves it
customer_reviews.text: Used this while transitioning my 6 lb. yorkie from regular dog food to primal dog food. She loves it, it's the first time she has ever "guarded" her food from the cat. She likes it dry or wet. When I need to give her meds or supplements, I give it to her wet by soaking in 2 TBSP hot water, then smash it - it's a great way to cover anything she doesn't enjoy. When I'm in a hurry, she gets the dry brick...she loves it either way.
customer_reviews.author: N. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not Grain Free.
customer_reviews.text: Item says grain free yet there was quinoa I believe? I was shocked, this food upset my dogs stomach. So I use Stella & Chewy.
customer_reviews.author: MinimalistMomma

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. My only complaint is the price but all freeze dries raw products are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: My dogs lineup for these every morning
customer_reviews.text: My dogs lineup for these every morning as their breakfast! And actually, the cats like to steal them from the dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Dudash

customer_reviews.title: TeddyBear really likes it
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle on his dry food and spices up his food and he likes it
customer_reviews.author: Joy C. Primiano

customer_reviews.title: Loves this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this product. She doesn’t eat her meals without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AND DOG WILL EAT THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely wonderful product. i have an extremely picky dog and she loves this product just LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs live this
customer_reviews.text: My Cairns love this food. I mix it with their current Acana dog kibble. You must rehydrate it before you feed it to your dogs! Very important!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalLin

customer_reviews.title: the dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use as treats for training-crumble up, the dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Quality old?
customer_reviews.text: Hmm. Not sure if it’s supposed to be soggy? I’m used to it being hard and dried.
customer_reviews.author: shari tachibana

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and high quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this and it's one of the healthiest foods you can buy if you don't buy fresh raw. It's freeze dried not dehydrated. According to "whole dog journal": "Dehydration alters the cellular structure of meats, fruits, and vegetables much more than freeze-drying. The appearance and taste of foods are less affected by freeze-drying than by dehydration, largely because higher temperatures are used to dehydrate foods; they are actually lightly cooked by the heat of drying." All the primal food are great!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Hard blocks.  Good though.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like it, but not as much as the turkey salmon flavor. Also, it's rather hard. I found the blocks difficult to break up.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Ibis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11lb toy poodle. I didnt trust dog foods until I found Primal. I cooked my dogs food for three years prior. He loves primal and has been super healthy and never gets bored. Its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tao Miller

customer_reviews.title: and my two BC's LOVE it! Even the cats go crazy for it
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a topper on Orijen dry food, and my two BC's LOVE it! Even the cats go crazy for it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these lamb nuggets. Can be used as food or a treat.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great food for dogs, a little dry, but add a little water, or ;use as a treat.

customer_reviews.text: Dogs appreciate a little of this added to their kibble.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love all the Primal Freeze Dried flavors
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love all the Primal Freeze Dried flavors. Lamb and Beef flavors definitely deserve more than 5 stars. Wish the price wouldn't fluctuate so much but most of the time, it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha808

customer_reviews.title: My dog was an extremely picky eater and also has ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog was an extremely picky eater and also has allergies. He actually likes this food and has helped with allergies. He is not scratching as much and does not chew on his paws as much. He will eat it dry or moistened just a little.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was fine but still have trouble with what my dogs will eat
customer_reviews.author: cindy s.

customer_reviews.title: ... interviews with my four greyhounds) and it makes a great topper to entice picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty (according to interviews with my four greyhounds) and it makes a great topper to entice picky eaters. It can be either broken into chunks and soaked in water for a few minutes, or crumbled finely over wet food. My picky eater currently loves lamb, so the availability of this flavor was the big selling point.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Schnoodle approved!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old Schnoodle absolutely LOVES THIS FOOD! The only way she will eat her dry food is with a couple this nuggets mixed in. It has really helped her digestive system. No more upset tummies. I recommend this food for any sensitive and picky dog ! <3
customer_reviews.author: Yvette10413

customer_reviews.title: And it's a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The primal products are phenomenal. My dog loves them. And it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bobo loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get his "regular" freeze-dried so I tried these instead. Good choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves this and she is a picky eater
customer_reviews.author: vnodak

customer_reviews.title: Lamb Formula Primal Pet Food
customer_reviews.text: I have the MOST picky dog and he absolutely LOVES this food. I can't believe that I found something that my rottie will actually eat and looks forward to having. It is expensive so I use it as training treats for agility and mix it with his other food to get him to eat. Who knew a rottweiller could be so picky?!
customer_reviews.author: Pepi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & Perfect for Allergies and Picky Eaters
customer_reviews.text: My Soft Coated Wheaten Terrier has some allergies and easily gets an upset bowel. Upon my veterinarians advice, I tried Primal freeze dried formula's and my pup LOVES it. His belly is no longer upset, his skin is happier and he has a lot more energy. He's been eating Primal for 7 months and is a different dog. He licks the bowl clean. It's expensive, but worth every cent. I do mix it with a grain free small amount of kibble to control protein content as his breed is prone to kidney issues. Keep this in mind if you have a breed that is at risk for PLE or PLN. Highly recommended food.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: freeze dried raw best diet for pooch
customer_reviews.text: made in usa. freeze dried raw best diet for pooch. just add water. no fillers, no grains, no junk. nutrition my dog loves.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Although they enjoyed the taste
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work out well for my dogs. Although they enjoyed the taste, they both ended up with bloody stools and vomiting for several days. I would not recommend this product to other dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie likes the lamb best of all.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried the chicken and duck and she dislikes the duck and will tolerate the chicken. I boil chicken and add it to the lamb that I break up. Sometimes I add boiled carrots. This has been approved by my daughters Pet Oncologist who she takes her dog to. ( Cancer). The doctor says only use grain free products.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi C

customer_reviews.title: This is really good stuff. It works like "wet food" if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really good stuff. It works like "wet food" if you just add a dash of water! my dog loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Koh

customer_reviews.title: Dog food alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great product, both my odds stopped scratching , and lost a few pounds both my vet and I are pleased with the change.
customer_reviews.author: Pia  DiMiceli

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was stale and hard - couldn't really break apart the pieces
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Primal is one of the foods I switch off between. I also buy it raw at the store, but they don't have the freeze-dried, which is convenient if I forget to thaw some out. Good quality and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Daisy (Labradoodle), loves this freeze dried food!!! Thanks, Judy Gallin
customer_reviews.author: Judy B. Gallin

customer_reviews.title: Great food! I switch off with the Chicken
customer_reviews.text: Great food! I switch off with the Chicken, Lamb, and Beef. My dog loves it and he's 15 years old!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lieb

product_meta.title: Primal Freeze Dried Dog Food Lamb Formula

Size:14 ozInvoice Description: primal fd Lamb dog 14oz
primal pet foods raw canine Lamb freeze-dried formula is formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO dog food nutrient profiles for all life stages.
fresh Lamb for superior levels of amino and essential fatty acids
finely ground, fresh Lamb bones for optimum levels of calcium
organic produce for food-derived vitamins a, b-complex, C and d
cold-water salmon Oil for essential Omega-3 fatty acids
organic and unrefined nutritional supplements for digestion and circulation
vitamin E as an antioxidant
organic coconut oil for short and medium chain saturated fatty acids
